local_intent: Confirm visibility, approach and align above the grape, open gripper, then lower slowly until contact and verify contact sensed.
assumptions: Safe collision-free path to move above and descend
Contact threshold of 10 is sufficient to detect touch without crushing
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around the approach phase: visibility check -> move above -> precise alignment -> open gripper -> LowerUntilContact -> verify contact.
